commentBody:
As someone who identifies with that term [self-identified], I love it.

I'm not quite "in the closet", my family and colsest friends know about me.
I'm not "out of the closet" either... my work buddies and aquaintances don't know...
It doesn't come up organically as we speak about our jobs... "Hey, Steve, could you update me on the legal status of that property? Oh, and by the way, I'm gay" cmmon...

So the fact that a new term is emerging is quite refreshing to me.

I’ll tell you about my sexual orientation if I see it appropriate and/or fit. Thank you.
